nodes.text: Fern was a gas giant–type planet with twenty moons that occupied the eighth orbital position around the star Asar. It was located within the Ilum system, a part of the Unknown Regions' 7G sector.
Fern was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Ilum system, and therefore Fern, in grid square G-7.
